BookDTO.Author: Gambardella, Matthew
BookDTO.Title: XML Developer's Guide
BookDTO.Description: An in-depth look at creating applications with XML.

BookDTO.Author: Ralls, Kim
BookDTO.Title: Midnight Rain
BookDTO.Description: A former architect battles corporate zombies, an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queen of the world.

BookDTO.Author: Corets, Eva
BookDTO.Title: Maeve Ascendant
BookDTO.Description: After the collapse of a nanotechnology society in England, the young survivors lay the foundation for a new society.

BookDTO.Author: Corets, Eva
BookDTO.Title: Oberon's Legacy
BookDTO.Description: In post-apocalypse England, the mysterious agent known only as Oberon helps to create a new life for the inhabitants of London. Sequel to Maeve Ascendant.

BookDTO.Author: Corets, Eva
BookDTO.Title: The Sundered Grail
BookDTO.Description: The two daughters of Maeve, half-sisters, battle one another for control of England. Sequel to Oberon's Legacy.

BookDTO.Author: Randall, Cynthia
BookDTO.Title: Lover Birds
BookDTO.Description: When Carla meets Paul at an ornithology conference, tempers fly as feathers get ruffled.

BookDTO.Author: Thurman, Paula
BookDTO.Title: Splish Splash
BookDTO.Description: A deep sea diver finds true love twenty thousand leagues beneath the sea.

BookDTO.Author: Knorr, Stefan
BookDTO.Title: Creepy Crawlies
BookDTO.Description: An anthology of horror stories about roaches, centipedes, scorpions and other insects.

BookDTO.Author: Kress, Peter
BookDTO.Title: Paradox Lost
BookDTO.Description: After an inadvertant trip through a Heisenberg Uncertainty Device, James Salway discovers the problems of being quantum.

BookDTO.Author: O'Brien, Tim
BookDTO.Title: Microsoft .NET: The Programming Bible
BookDTO.Description: Microsoft's .NET initiative is explored in detail in this deep programmer's reference.

BookDTO.Author: O'Brien, Tim
BookDTO.Title: MSXML3: A Comprehensive Guide
BookDTO.Description: The Microsoft MSXML3 parser is covered in detail, with attention to XML DOM interfaces, XSLT processing, SAX and more.

BookDTO.Author: Galos, Mike
BookDTO.Title: Visual Studio 7: A Comprehensive Guide
BookDTO.Description: Microsoft Visual Studio 7 is explored in depth, looking at how Visual Basic, Visual C++, C#, and ASP+ are integrated into a comprehensive development environment.
